attributes.action: refer all MPs to local constituency police for expenses interview under Fraud Act 2006, and immediately impeach any MP who has submitted inesential expenses, including second home flipping
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Refer all MPs to local constituency police for immediate expenses interview under Fraud Act 2006, and immediately impeach any MP who has submitted inesential expenses, including second home flipping.

Where for constituency expenses, this to be done by constituency police, not Metropolitan Police; as too cosy to government and not to local constituency public standards of expectation of behaviour.
attributes.creator_name: Neil Humphrey, Lord Protector of England during Magna Carta breach 04-1036

rejection.details: The PM cannot instruct the police and CPS in this way.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
